description: The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) has a requirement to provide Physiotherapy Services to offenders at Millhaven Institution to meet CSC’s mandate to implement primary health care and essential health services at all stages of an offender’s sentence. The Contractor must provide physiotherapy in accordance with applicable professional health services standards and the College of Physiotherapists of Ontario’s professional practice standards and related guidelines. To provide quality physiotherapy to the offender population in accordance with professionally accepted standards including generating relevant reports and findings in the provision of this care to offenders. To document physiotherapy treatments in CSC Electronic Medical Records as required. To provide up to a maximum of 144 hours per year or 432 hours for the entire contract period.

**Request for Proposal:**

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is soliciting proposals from qualified health service providers for the provision of Physiotherapy Services at Millhaven Institution. The successful proponent will provide quality physiotherapy to the offender population in accordance with professionally accepted standards and the College of Physiotherapists of Ontario’s professional practice standards.

**Key Objectives:**

- Provide physiotherapy in accordance with applicable professional health services standards.
- Document physiotherapy treatments in CSC Electronic Medical Records.
- Offer up to a maximum of 144 hours per year of physiotherapy services.

**Eligibility and Application:**

 All proposers must review and submit their bid through the Canada Buys website. Any questions or requests for clarifications must be directed to the contact person provided above.
